author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
A few months back you may recall Fedora Linux trying to drop multilib and getting a lot of push back for doing so by developers and gamers alike most importantly because the Steam client itself is a 32 bit, but with Valve dropping support for 32 bit Windows 10, maybe there is finally hope.

title: Maybe Fedora Linux Was Right All Along
